name: NoBody (itch)
description:
Submission to Weekly Game Jam #32 Theme: Missing Piece

After years of rest you come back from the dead! To your disappointment, you come back as a skeleton. Graverobbers have stolen your riches (including your body!).

Rise from the grave and claim back your missing pieces!

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Spacebar to interact
  • Click to attack

Art by PixelTitan

Audio by Benjo https://soundcloud.com/benjo195

Coding by jvolonte
